titles.title: Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1986
A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for door delivery of mail to the physically handicapped, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, US Postal Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1986 - Requires, upon approval of an application which includes a physician's certification of need, the delivery of mail to the door of handicapped individuals.
